title: Weird bug
body: So I tried to enter a match today but the client had this weird bug and in champ select while I was attempting to redo my materies page it wouldn't let me select a tier two mastery. Following this the client refused to open the game even after relaunching the Alpha client. Also though I cannot see or participate in the match I can still hear what is happening. Along wit this there is no reconnect option is this not included yet or is my client just bugged to the extreme? Please let me know if any of you have encountered this problem. Thanks guys!

replies.body: There should be a reconnect screen if your game crashed. If you see this behavior again, please submit a bug report.
